data.eml:eml: Hesperentomon yangi sp. n. from Jiangsu Province, Eastern China, with analyses of DNA barcodes (Protura, Acerentomata, Hesperentomidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bai, Yi, Bu, Yun (2013): Hesperentomon yangi sp. n. from Jiangsu Province, Eastern China, with analyses of DNA barcodes (Protura, Acerentomata, Hesperentomidae). ZooKeys 338: 29-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.338.6099, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.338.6099
